DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective : - To evaluate long-term safety tolerability SR58611A ( amibegron ) patient major depressive disorder ( MDD ) . Secondary objective : - To determine plasma concentration SR58878 ( active metabolite SR58611A ) , pharmacokinetic population analysis , evaluate quality life ( QoL ) patient MDD , evaluate efficacy amibegron patient MDD .
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Safety Tolerability SR58611 Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: patient define Diagnosis Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , recurrent episode least 1 month prior entry study , total score > 18 Hamilton Depression Rating Scale ( HAMD ) 17items .
